title: 10 Things You Didnâ€™t Know Your Data Can Do for You
description:
In a world of data clouds, data lakes, data warehouses, databases, we are drowning in data. But are we drawing every last drop of value from it? By letting your data do the work, you can simplify your infrastructure, automate your workflow, and save money.


In this talk, Karen will demonstrate through the lifecycle of a real-world example how modern applications can easily design, grow, and secure their data while deriving analytical insights, driving diverse workloads, and developing practical functionality for a deeply engaging end-user experience. 


Learn the 10 things data can do for you and free up your developers to do what they do best: building better products.
